text: Is there a way to attach extra json schema with the webhook POST? I mean, I want to send contact data to the third party, when user submits the form. The third party service needs some required schema, and i dont know how can I do this with Webhook. Is it possible or I will need middleware for this?

Engagements on the company activity timeline do not show an ID even in the source. Best bet is to use the Get Associated Engagements endpoint which sounds like that's what you are using...
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/engagements/get_associated_engagements>

Hi Guys, I am trying to update a contact property via this method:

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/contacts/update_contact>

The property I am trying to update is a checkbox field with 4 potential values. Does anyone know the correct data format to send the value in?

I have tried sending as an array which although the API doesn’t error, the value on the contact in HubSpot becomes blank. If I try sending it as a comma separated string, it is rejected because it doesn’t match one of the allowed values. I am not sure what else to try.

Thanks!!
Hello, guys, iam sending a form trough api, how can i get the source data? the docu said something about activate a cookie to send this data, how can i do it?
